name: Plushie Tag
desc:
Stick it on your friend or throw it on the grount for instant marketability. (Soaking and throwing against a wall is optional).
Gives ally Plushie for 3 turns.
Unit cannot use weapons, doubles HP, -50 Avoid, Provoke, and 100% HP Regen while has Plushie status.
Or throw it to make a plushie decoy.
Item created by Haunted Axe/Memae.
